name: Clickbait (Lake Shore Drive Games)
description:
BREAKING NEWS

Clickbait is a first-person photography puzzle game where you must take pictures of exaggerated, sensational, and downright deceptive scenes to gain followers and views for your failing publication! 

Controls

WASD: Move character

Mouse:  Move camera

F: Aim camera

Left Mouse Button: Pick up/Drop 

How to play

Take photographs of the assigned subjects below. Note, some photographs will require you to have two subjects or more.

*We highly recommend playing the game in fullscreen to get the best experience!

Your assignment Here are a few helpful hints of something you should photograph:
1. A sketchy meeting taking place
2. Medical malpractice
3. An unexpected matchup
4. Proof of aliens
5. A new weight loss regimen
6. A restaurant health code violation

7. Hype for a new menu item

Credits
